                             66:import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlOptions;                                                                                                                                           
                             67:import org.openxmlformats.schemas.spreadsheetml.x2006.main.*;                                                                                                                    
                             68:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             69:/**                                                                                                                                                                              
                             70: * High level representation of a SpreadsheetML worksheet.                                                                                                                       
                             71: *                                                                                                                                                                               
                             72: * <p>                                                                                                                                                                           
                             73: * Sheets are the central structures within a workbook, and are where a user does most of his spreadsheet work.                                                                  
                             74: * The most common type of sheet is the worksheet, which is represented as a grid of cells. Worksheet cells can                                                                  
                             75: * contain text, numbers, dates, and formulas. Cells can also be formatted.                                                                                                      
                             76: * </p>                                                                                                                                                                          
                             77: */                                                                                                                                                                              
                             78:public class XSSFSheet extends POIXMLDocumentPart implements Sheet, OoxmlSheetExtensions  {                                                                                      
                             79:    private static final Logger LOG = PoiLogManager.getLogger(XSSFSheet.class);                                                                                                  
                             80:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             81:    private static final double DEFAULT_ROW_HEIGHT = 15.0;                                                                                                                       
                             82:    private static final double DEFAULT_MARGIN_HEADER = 0.3;                                                                                                                     
                             83:    private static final double DEFAULT_MARGIN_FOOTER = 0.3;                                                                                                                     
                             84:    private static final double DEFAULT_MARGIN_TOP = 0.75;                                                                                                                       
                             85:    private static final double DEFAULT_MARGIN_BOTTOM = 0.75;                                                                                                                    
                             86:    private static final double DEFAULT_MARGIN_LEFT = 0.7;                                                                                                                       
                             87:    private static final double DEFAULT_MARGIN_RIGHT = 0.7;                                                                                                                      
                             88:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             89:    //TODO make the two variable below private!                                                                                                                                  
                             90:    protected CTSheet sheet;                                                                                                                                                     
                             91:    protected CTWorksheet worksheet;                                                                                                                                             
                             92:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             93:    private final SortedMap<Integer, XSSFRow> _rows = new TreeMap<>();                                                                                                           
                             94:    private List<XSSFHyperlink> hyperlinks;                                                                                                                                      
                             95:    private ColumnHelper columnHelper;                                                                                                                                           
                             96:    private Comments sheetComments;                                                                                                                                              
                             97:    /**                                                                                                                                                                          
                             98:     * cache of master shared formulas in this sheet.                                                                                                                            
                             99:     * Master shared formula is the first formula in a group of shared formulas is saved in the f element.                                                                       
                             100:     */                                                                                                                                                                         
                             101:    private Map<Integer, CTCellFormula> sharedFormulas;                                                                                                                         
                             102:    private SortedMap<String,XSSFTable> tables;                                                                                                                                 
                             103:    private List<CellRangeAddress> arrayFormulas;                                                                                                                               
                             104:    private final XSSFDataValidationHelper dataValidationHelper;                                                                                                                
                             105:    private XSSFVMLDrawing xssfvmlDrawing;                                                                                                                                      
                             106:    private CellRangeAddress dimensionOverride;                                                                                                                                 
                             107:    private double arbitraryExtraWidth = 0.0;                                                                                                                                   
                             108:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             109:    /**                                                                                                                                                                         
                             110:     * Creates new XSSFSheet   - called by XSSFWorkbook to create a sheet from scratch.                                                                                         
                             111:     *                                                                                                                                                                          
                             112:     * @see XSSFWorkbook#createSheet()                                                                                                                                          
                             113:     */                                                                                                                                                                         
                             114:    protected XSSFSheet() {                                                                                                                                                     
                             115:        super();                                                                                                                                                                
                             116:        dataValidationHelper = new XSSFDataValidationHelper(this);                                                                                                              
                             117:        onDocumentCreate();                                                                                                                                                     
                             118:    }                                                                                                                                                                           
                             119:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             120:    /**                                                                                                                                                                         
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
                             poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/xssf/usermodel/XSSFSheet.java:330-380                                                                                                        
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             330:     * @param region to merge                                                                                                                                                   
                             331:     * @param validate whether to validate merged region                                                                                                                        
                             332:     * @return 0-based index of this region                                                                                                                                     
                             333:     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if region contains fewer than 2 cells (this check is inexpensive and is performed regardless of {@code validate})                       
                             334:     * @throws IllegalStateException if region intersects with a multi-cell array formula                                                                                       
                             335:     * @throws IllegalStateException if region intersects with an existing region on this sheet                                                                                 
                             336:     */                                                                                                                                                                         
                             337:    private int addMergedRegion(CellRangeAddress region, boolean validate) {                                                                                                    
                             338:        if (region.getNumberOfCells() < 2) {                                                                                                                                    
                             339:            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Merged region " + region.formatAsString() + " must contain 2 or more cells");                                                   
                             340:        }                                                                                                                                                                       
                             341:        region.validate(SpreadsheetVersion.EXCEL2007);                                                                                                                          
                             342:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             343:        if (validate) {                                                                                                                                                         
                             344:            // throw IllegalStateException if the argument CellRangeAddress intersects with                                                                                     
                             345:            // a multi-cell array formula defined in this sheet                                                                                                                 
                             346:            validateArrayFormulas(region);                                                                                                                                      
                             347:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             348:            // Throw IllegalStateException if the argument CellRangeAddress intersects with                                                                                     
                             349:            // a merged region already in this sheet                                                                                                                            
                             350:            validateMergedRegions(region);                                                                                                                                      
                             351:        }                                                                                                                                                                       
                             352:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             353:        CTMergeCells ctMergeCells = worksheet.isSetMergeCells() ? worksheet.getMergeCells() : worksheet.addNewMergeCells();                                                     
                             354:        CTMergeCell ctMergeCell = ctMergeCells.addNewMergeCell();                                                                                                               
                             355:        ctMergeCell.setRef(region.formatAsString());                                                                                                                            
                             356:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             357:        long count = ctMergeCells.getCount();                                                                                                                                   
                             358:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             359:        if (count == 0) {                                                                                                                                                       
                             360:            count=ctMergeCells.sizeOfMergeCellArray();                                                                                                                          
                             361:        } else {                                                                                                                                                                
                             362:            count++;                                                                                                                                                            
                             363:        }                                                                                                                                                                       
                             364:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             365:        // also adjust the number of merged regions overall                                                                                                                     
                             366:        ctMergeCells.setCount(count);                                                                                                                                           
                             367:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             368:        return Math.toIntExact(count-1);                                                                                                                                        
                             369:    }                                                                                                                                                                           
                             370:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             371:    /**                                                                                                                                                                         
                             372:     * Verify that the candidate region does not intersect with an existing multi-cell array formula in this sheet                                                              
                             373:     *                                                                                                                                                                          
                             374:     * @param region a region that is validated.                                                                                                                                
                             375:     * @throws IllegalStateException if candidate region intersects an existing array formula in this sheet                                                                     
                             376:     */                                                                                                                                                                         
                             377:    private void validateArrayFormulas(CellRangeAddress region) {                                                                                                               
                             378:        // FIXME: this may be faster if it looped over array formulas directly rather than looping over each cell in                                                            
                             379:        // the region and searching if that cell belongs to an array formula                                                                                                    
                             380:        int firstRow = region.getFirstRow();                                                                                                                                    
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
                             poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/xssf/eventusermodel/ReadOnlySharedStringsTable.java:1-60                                                                                     
                             ```

                             19:import static org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFRelation.NS_SPREADSHEETML;                                                                                                       
                             20:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             21:import java.io.IOException;                                                                                                                                                      
                             22:import java.io.InputStream;                                                                                                                                                      
                             23:import java.io.PushbackInputStream;                                                                                                                                              
                             24:import java.util.ArrayList;                                                                                                                                                      
                             25:import java.util.List;                                                                                                                                                           
                             26:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             27:import javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException;                                                                                                                           
                             28:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             29:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.OPCPackage;                                                                                                                                  
                             30:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.PackagePart;                                                                                                                                 
                             31:import org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.RichTextString;                                                                                                                               
                             32:import org.apache.poi.util.XMLHelper;                                                                                                                                            
                             33:import org.apache.poi.xssf.model.SharedStrings;                                                                                                                                  
                             34:import org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFRelation;                                                                                                                               
                             35:import org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFRichTextString;                                                                                                                         
                             36:import org.xml.sax.Attributes;                                                                                                                                                   
                             37:import org.xml.sax.InputSource;                                                                                                                                                  
                             38:import org.xml.sax.SAXException;                                                                                                                                                 
                             39:import org.xml.sax.XMLReader;                                                                                                                                                    
                             40:import org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler;                                                                                                                                       
                             41:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             42:/**                                                                                                                                                                              
                             43: * <p>This is a lightweight way to process the Shared Strings                                                                                                                    
                             44: *  table. Most of the text cells will reference something                                                                                                                       
                             45: *  from in here.                                                                                                                                                                
                             46: * <p>Note that each SI entry can have multiple T elements, if the                                                                                                               
                             47: *  string is made up of bits with different formatting.                                                                                                                         
                             48: * <p>Example input:                                                                                                                                                             
                             49: * <pre>{@code                                                                                                                                                                   
                             50: * <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?>                                                                                                                      
                             51: *     <sst xmlns="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/spreadsheetml/2006/main" count="2" uniqueCount="2">                                                                         
                             52: *         <si>                                                                                                                                                                  
                             53: *             <r>                                                                                                                                                               
                             54: *                 <rPr>                                                                                                                                                         
                             55: *                     <b />                                                                                                                                                     
                             56: *                     <sz val="11" />                                                                                                                                           
                             57: *                     <color theme="1" />                                                                                                                                       
                             58: *                     <rFont val="Calibri" />                                                                                                                                   
                             59: *                     <family val="2" />                                                                                                                                        
                             60: *                     <scheme val="minor" />                                                                                                                                    
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             <code>

                             190:        columnHelper = new ColumnHelper(worksheet);

                             193:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             194:    private void initRows(CTWorksheet worksheetParam) {                                                                                                                         
                             195:        if (worksheetParam.getSheetData() == null || worksheetParam.getSheetData().getRowArray() == null) {                                                                     
                             196:            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Had empty sheet data when initializing the sheet");                                                                             
                             197:        }                                                                                                                                                                       
                             198:                                                                                                                                                                                
                             199:        _rows.clear();                                                                                                                                                          
                             200:        tables = new TreeMap<>();                                                                                                                                               
                             201:        sharedFormulas = new HashMap<>();                                                                                                                                       
                             202:        arrayFormulas = new ArrayList<>();                                                                                                                                      
                             203:        for (CTRow row : worksheetParam.getSheetData().getRowArray()) {                                                                                                         
                             204:            XSSFRow r = new XSSFRow(row, this);                                                                                                                                 
                             205:            // Performance optimization: explicit boxing is slightly faster than auto-unboxing, though may use more memory                                                      
                             206:            //noinspection UnnecessaryBoxing                                                                                                                                    
                             207:            final Integer rownumI = Integer.valueOf(r.getRowNum()); // NOSONAR                                                                                                  
                             208:            _rows.put(rownumI, r);                                                                                                                                              
                             209:        }                                                                                                                                                                       
                             210:    }                                                                                                                                                                           
                             ```

                             #8 CACHED

                             #10 [ 8/14]                                                                                                                                                                         
                             ... [TRUNCATED]                                                                                                                                                                     
                             ===Issue===                                                                                                                                                                         
                             ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ===Evaluation Report===                                                                                                                                                             
                             # Evaluation Report                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Summary                                                                                                                                                                          
                             The codebase exhibited a libFuzzer timeout when parsing large or malformed XLSX contents. A patch was proposed to introduce streamlength limits and sheet row                      
                             count checks by importing two new classes`POIXMLProperties` and `LimitInputStream`from `org.apache.poi.poixml` and wrapping relevant `InputStream` usages in                      
                             `XSSFSheet` and `ReadOnlySharedStringsTable`. After applying the patch, the build failed during compilation of the poi-ooxml module: the new package                                
                             `org.apache.poi.poixml` was not found, and symbols `POIXMLProperties` and `LimitInputStream` could not be resolved.                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Description                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             1. Initial Issue                                                                                                                                                                    
                                - The fuzzer harness reported `ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout` while exercising the XLSX parsing routines in the XSSF event and usermodel code paths.                                 
                                - No stack trace or parsing error appeared; the issue manifested solely as a timeout under fuzzing conditions.                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             2. Observations in the Initial Issue                                                                                                                                                
                                - The timeout suggests unbounded parsing of XML or exceptionally large sheet/strings payloads.                                                                                   
                                - The error did not point to a specific parser exception or leakonly that the fuzzer gave up after the timeout threshold.                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             3. Patch Attempt                                                                                                                                                                    
                                - In `XSSFSheet.read(InputStream is)`, the original code                                                                                                                         
                                  ```java                                                                                                                                                                        
                                  worksheet = WorksheetDocument.Factory.parse(is, DEFAULT_XML_OPTIONS).getWorksheet();                                                                                           
                                  ```                                                                                                                                                                            
                                  was modified to                                                                                                                                                                
                                  ```java                                                                                                                                                                        
                                  LimitInputStream limited = new LimitInputStream(is, POIXMLProperties.getMaxSheetXmlBytes());                                                                                   
                                  worksheet = WorksheetDocument.Factory.parse(limited, DEFAULT_XML_OPTIONS).getWorksheet();                                                                                      
                                  ```                                                                                                                                                                            
                                  and a rowcount guard was added during row iteration, throwing if the count exceeds `POIXMLProperties.getMaxRowsPerSheet()`.                                                   
                                - In `ReadOnlySharedStringsTable.readFrom(InputStream is)`, the incoming stream was similarly wrapped:                                                                           
                                  ```java                                                                                                                                                                        
                                  LimitInputStream limited = new LimitInputStream(is, POIXMLProperties.getMaxSharedStringsBytes());                                                                              
                                  PushbackInputStream pis = new PushbackInputStream(limited, 1);                                                                                                                 
                                  ```                                                                                                                                                                            
                                - Two imports were added to both classes:                                                                                                                                        
                                  ```java                                                                                                                                                                        
                                  import org.apache.poi.poixml.POIXMLProperties;                                                                                                                                 
                                  import org.apache.poi.poixml.LimitInputStream;                                                                                                                                 
                                  ```                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             4. Patch Result and Build Log                                                                                                                                                       
                                - Compilation of most modules (poi, poi-scratchpad, poi-ooxml-lite, etc.) succeeded with warnings, but poi-ooxml failed outright.                                                
                                - Errors reported:                                                                                                                                                               
                                   `package org.apache.poi.poixml does not exist`                                                                                                                               
                                   `cannot find symbol: class LimitInputStream`                                                                                                                                 
                                   `cannot find symbol: variable POIXMLProperties`                                                                                                                              
                                - A total of 11 errors in poi-ooxml source files and 10 deprecation/warning messages elsewhere.                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             5. Areas for Further Investigation                                                                                                                                                  
                                - The location and packaging of the proposed classes `POIXMLProperties` and `LimitInputStream`. Determine if they exist in another module or under a different                   
                             package (e.g., `org.apache.poi.openxml4j`).                                                                                                                                         
                                - The projects Gradle settings and module dependencies for poi-ooxmlverify whether a `poixml` artifact or source directory is present and included.                            
                                - XML parsing entry points in `XSSFSheet` and `ReadOnlySharedStringsTable` to identify any other unbounded reads or buffers that could trigger timeouts under                    
                             fuzzing.                                                                                                                                                                            
                                - Configuration defaults for maximum sheet XML size and row countlocate where such properties would be defined or should be defined to support limits.                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Initial Issue Log

                             </issue>

                             Deprecated Gradle features were used in this build, making it incompatible with Gradle 9.0.                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             You can use '--warning-mode all' to show the individual deprecation warnings and determine if they co                                                                               
                             ... [TRUNCATED]                                                                                                                                                                     
                             </additional_issue>                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Notes                                                                                                                                                                            
                             - All patch attempts are applied to the initial codebase. Reapply the the previous patches if needed.                                                                               
                             - If multiple different issues are present, all the issues must be resolved in a single patch attempt.                                                                              
                             - Try different approaches to resolve the issues.                                                                                                                                   
                             ===Analysis Report===

                             1:/* ====================================================================

                             17:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             18:package org.apache.poi.openxml4j.util;                                                                                                                                           
                             19:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             20:import java.io.EOFException;                                                                                                                                                     
                             21:import java.io.FilterInputStream;                                                                                                                                                
                             22:import java.io.IOException;                                                                                                                                                      
                             23:import java.io.InputStream;                                                                                                                                                      
                             24:import java.util.Locale;                                                                                                                                                         
                             25:import java.util.zip.ZipException;                                                                                                                                               
                             26:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             27:import org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.zip.ZipArchiveEntry;                                                                                                                
                             28:import org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.zip.ZipArchiveInputStream;                                                                                                          
                             29:import org.apache.commons.compress.utils.InputStreamStatistics;                                                                                                                  
                             30:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.NotOfficeXmlFileException;                                                                                                            
                             31:import org.apache.poi.util.IOUtils;                                                                                                                                              
                             32:import org.apache.poi.util.Internal;                                                                                                                                             
                             33:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             34:import static org.apache.poi.openxml4j.util.ZipSecureFile.*;                                                                                                                     
                             35:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             36:@Internal                                                                                                                                                                        
                             37:public class ZipArchiveThresholdInputStream extends FilterInputStream {                                                                                                          
                             38:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             39:    private static final String MAX_ENTRY_SIZE_MSG =                                                                                                                             
                             40:        "Zip bomb detected! The file would exceed the max size of the expanded data in the zip-file.\n" +                                                                        
                             41:        "This may indicates that the file is used to inflate memory usage and thus could pose a security risk.\n" +                                                              
                             42:        "You can adjust this limit via ZipSecureFile.setMaxEntrySize() if you need to work with files which are very large.\n" +                                                 
                             43:        "Uncompressed size: %d, Raw/compressed size: %d\n" +                                                                                                                     
                             44:        "Limits: MAX_ENTRY_SIZE: %d, Entry: %s";                                                                                                                                 
                             45:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             46:    private static final String MIN_INFLATE_RATIO_MSG =                                                                                                                          
                             47:        "Zip bomb detected! The file would exceed the max. ratio of compressed file size to the size of the expanded data.\n" +                                                  
                             48:        "This may indicate that the file is used to inflate memory usage and thus could pose a security risk.\n" +                                                               
                             49:        "You can adjust this limit via ZipSecureFile.setMinInflateRatio() if you need to work with files which exceed this limit.\n" +                                           
                             50:        "Uncompressed size: %d, Raw/compressed size: %d, ratio: %f\n" +                                                                                                          
                             51:        "Limits: MIN_INFLATE_RATIO: %f, Entry: %s";                                                                                                                              
                             52:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             53:    /**                                                                                                                                                                          
                             54:     * the reference to the current entry is only used for a more detailed log message in case of an error                                                                       
                             55:     */                                                                                                                                                                          
                             56:    private ZipArchiveEntry entry;                                                                                                                                               
                             57:    private boolean guardState = true;                                                                                                                                           
                             58:    private long entryCount;                                                                                                                                                     
                             59:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             60:    public ZipArchiveThresholdInputStream(InputStream is) {                                                                                                                      
                             61:        super(is);                                                                                                                                                               
                             62:        if (!(is instanceof InputStreamStatistics)) {                                                                                                                            
                             63:            throw new IllegalArgumentException("InputStream of class "+is.getClass()+" is not implementing InputStreamStatistics.");                                             
                             64:        }                                                                                                                                                                        
                             65:    }                                                                                                                                                                            
                             66:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             67:    @Override                                                                                                                                                                    
                             68:    public int read() throws IOException {                                                                                                                                       
                             69:        int b = super.read();                                                                                                                                                    
                             70:        if (b > -1) {                                                                                                                                                            
                             71:            checkThreshold();                                                                                                                                                    
                             72:        }                                                                                                                                                                        
                             73:        return b;                                                                                                                                                                
                             74:    }                                                                                                                                                                            
                             75:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             76:    @Override                                                                                                                                                                    
                             77:    public int read(byte[] b, int off, int len) throws IOException {                                                                                                             
                             78:        int cnt = super.read(b, off, len);                                                                                                                                       
                             79:        if (cnt > -1) {                                                                                                                                                          
                             80:            checkThreshold();                                                                                                                                                    
                             81:        }                                                                                                                                                                        
                             82:        return cnt;                                                                                                                                                              
                             83:    }                                                                                                                                                                            
                             84:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             85:    @Override                                                                                                                                                                    
                             86:    public long skip(long n) throws IOException {                                                                                                                                
                             87:        long cnt = IOUtils.skipFully(super.in, n);                                                                                                                               
                             88:        if (cnt > 0) {                                                                                                                                                           
                             89:            checkThreshold();                                                                                                                                                    
                             90:        }                                                                                                                                                                        
                             91:       return cnt;                                                                                                                                                               
                             92:    }                                                                                                                                                                            
                             93:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             94:    /**                                                                                                                                                                          
                             95:     * De-/activate threshold check.                                                                                                                                             
                             96:     * A disabled guard might make sense, when POI is processing its own temporary data (see #59743)                                                                             
                             97:     *                                                                                                                                                                           
                             98:     * @param guardState {@code true} (= default) enables the threshold check                                                                                                    
                             99:     */                                                                                                                                                                          
                             100:    public void setGuardState(boolean guardState) {                                                                                                                             
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>

                             poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/ooxml/POIXMLProperties.java:1-50

                             1:/* ====================================================================
