                             17:package org.apache.poi.ooxml;                                                                                                                                                    
                             18:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             19:import static org.apache.poi.ooxml.POIXMLTypeLoader.DEFAULT_XML_OPTIONS;                                                                                                         
                             20:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             21:import java.io.IOException;                                                                                                                                                      
                             22:import java.io.InputStream;                                                                                                                                                      
                             23:import java.io.OutputStream;                                                                                                                                                     
                             24:import java.util.Date;                                                                                                                                                           
                             25:import java.util.Optional;                                                                                                                                                       
                             26:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             27:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.InvalidFormatException;                                                                                                               
                             28:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.OpenXML4JException;                                                                                                                   
                             29:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.ContentTypes;                                                                                                                                
                             30:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.OPCPackage;                                                                                                                                  
                             31:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.PackagePart;                                                                                                                                 
                             32:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.PackagePartName;                                                                                                                             
                             33:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.PackageRelationshipCollection;                                                                                                               
                             34:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.PackageRelationshipTypes;                                                                                                                    
                             35:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.PackagingURIHelper;                                                                                                                          
                             36:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.StreamHelper;                                                                                                                                
                             37:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.TargetMode;                                                                                                                                  
                             38:import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.internal.PackagePropertiesPart;                                                                                                              
                             39:import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException;                                                                                                                                         
                             40:import org.openxmlformats.schemas.officeDocument.x2006.customProperties.CTProperty;                                                                                              
                             41:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             42:/**                                                                                                                                                                              
                             43: * Wrapper around the three different kinds of OOXML properties                                                                                                                  
                             44: *  and metadata a document can have (Core, Extended and Custom),                                                                                                                
                             45: *  as well Thumbnails.                                                                                                                                                          
                             46: */                                                                                                                                                                              
                             47:public class POIXMLProperties {                                                                                                                                                  
                             48:    private final OPCPackage pkg;                                                                                                                                                
                             49:    private final CoreProperties core;                                                                                                                                           
                             50:    private final ExtendedProperties ext;                                                                                                                                        
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             </code_snippets>                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Fix Strategy                                                                                                                                                                     
                             <fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             1. Introduce LimitInputStream in the correct package                                                                                                                                
                                - Create a new file `LimitInputStream.java` under `poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/openxml4j/util`.                                                                       
                                - Base its implementation on the existing `ZipArchiveThresholdInputStream` pattern:                                                                                              
                                   Extend `FilterInputStream`.                                                                                                                                                  
                                   Maintain a `long remaining` counter initialized to the constructors maxBytes parameter.                                                                                     
                                   Override `int read()`, `int read(byte[] b, int off, int len)`, and `long skip(long n)`.                                                                                      
                                     On each read/skip, decrement `remaining` by the number of bytes consumed.                                                                                                  
                                     If a read would exceed `remaining`, throw an `IOException` with a clear stream limit exceeded message.                                                                   
                                   Provide a setter to disable checks if needed (mirroring `setGuardState`), but keep checks enabled by default.                                                                
                                - Package declaration in `LimitInputStream.java`:                                                                                                                                
                                  ```                                                                                                                                                                            
                                  package org.apache.poi.openxml4j.util;                                                                                                                                         
                                  ```                                                                                                                                                                            
                                - This ensures all modules depending on `org.apache.poi.openxml4j.util`including poi-ooxmlsee the class.                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             2. Extend POIXMLProperties with static limit getters                                                                                                                                
                                - Modify `poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/ooxml/POIXMLProperties.java`:                                                                                                   
                                   Add static final defaults:                                                                                                                                                   
                                    ```                                                                                                                                                                          
                                    private static final long DEFAULT_MAX_SHEET_XML_BYTES      = 50L * 1024 * 1024; // 50MB                                                                                     
                                    private static final int  DEFAULT_MAX_ROWS_PER_SHEET        = 1_000_000;         // 1M rows                                                                                  
                                    private static final long DEFAULT_MAX_SHARED_STRINGS_BYTES  = 10L * 1024 * 1024; // 10MB                                                                                    
                                    ```                                                                                                                                                                          
                                   Expose them via public static getters:                                                                                                                                       
                                    ```                                                                                                                                                                          
                                    public static long getMaxSheetXmlBytes() { return DEFAULT_MAX_SHEET_XML_BYTES; }                                                                                             
                                    public static int  getMaxRowsPerSheet() { return DEFAULT_MAX_ROWS_PER_SHEET; }                                                                                               
                                    public static long getMaxSharedStringsBytes() { return DEFAULT_MAX_SHARED_STRINGS_BYTES; }                                                                                   
                                    ```                                                                                                                                                                          
                                - This anchors the configuration in the existing `ooxml` artifact without adding a new module.                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             3. Correct imports and apply stream limits in XSSFSheet                                                                                                                             
                                - In `poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/xssf/usermodel/XSSFSheet.java`, replace the two faulty imports:                                                                     
                                  ```                                                                                                                                                                            
                                  - import org.apache.poi.poixml.POIXMLProperties;                                                                                                                               
                                  - import org.apache.poi.poixml.LimitInputStream;                                                                                                                               
                                  + import org.apache.poi.ooxml.POIXMLProperties;                                                                                                                                
                                  + import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.util.LimitInputStream;                                                                                                                       
                                  ```                                                                                                                                                                            
                                - In the `protected void read(InputStream is)` method:                                                                                                                           
                                   Create `LimitInputStream limited = new LimitInputStream(is, POIXMLProperties.getMaxSheetXmlBytes());` before parsing.                                                        
                                   Pass `limited` to `WorksheetDocument.Factory.parse(...)`.                                                                                                                    
                                   Maintain the existing `catch (XmlException e)` block.                                                                                                                        
                                - In the rowiteration loop, add the rowcount guard exactly as in the last patch but using the same `POIXMLProperties` import.                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             4. Correct imports and apply stream limits in ReadOnlySharedStringsTable                                                                                                            
                                - In `poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/xssf/eventusermodel/ReadOnlySharedStringsTable.java`, update imports:                                                               
                                  ```                                                                                                                                                                            
                                  - import org.apache.poi.poixml.POIXMLProperties;                                                                                                                               
                                  - import org.apache.poi.poixml.LimitInputStream;                                                                                                                               
                                  + import org.apache.poi.ooxml.POIXMLProperties;                                                                                                                                
                                  + import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.util.LimitInputStream;                                                                                                                       
                                  ```                                                                                                                                                                            
                                - In `public void readFrom(InputStream is)`:                                                                                                                                     
                                   Instantiate `LimitInputStream limited = new LimitInputStream(is, POIXMLProperties.getMaxSharedStringsBytes());`.                                                             
                                   Use `new PushbackInputStream(limited, 1)` in place of `new PushbackInputStream(is, 1)`.                                                                                      
                                   Leave downstream parsing logic unchanged.                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             5. Preserve existing functionality and build configuration                                                                                                                          
                                - Do **not** modify any Gradle or Maven dependency files`openxml4j.util` is already part of the `poi-ooxml` artifact.                                                           
                                - Do **not** change any harness, fuzzing, or test code. All new logic is confined to parsers in the main source modules.                                                         
                                - The introduced `LimitInputStream` uses only standard Java I/O and throws `IOException`, which integrates seamlessly with existing `throws IOException`                         
                             signatures.                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             6. Justification and sideeffect mitigation                                                                                                                                         
                                - Placing `LimitInputStream` under `org.apache.poi.openxml4j.util` aligns with similar utilities (e.g., `ZipArchiveThresholdInputStream`) and ensures                            
                             compilation without adding new artifacts.                                                                                                                                           
                                - By centralizing maxsize properties in `POIXMLProperties`, future adjustments can be made in one place; no backwardincompatible changes arise.                                
                                - Default limits (50MB sheet XML, 1M rows, 10MB sharedstrings) are conservative to avoid false positives for typical spreadsheets, yet effectively bound                     
                             attackers or malformed files.                                                                                                                                                       
                                - If a user legitimately needs higher limits, they can override getters in a subclass or patch `POIXMLProperties` defaults.                                                      
                                - Overly broad exception catching is avoided`LimitInputStream` throws a clear `IOException`, which propagates to the existing catch blocks (e.g., wrapping in                   
                             `POIXMLException` for XML parse errors).                                                                                                                                            
                                - This patch does not alter any public APIs beyond introducing new behavior on large inputs, preserving compatibility.                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             7. Implementation steps                                                                                                                                                             
                                a. Create `LimitInputStream.java` under `poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/openxml4j/util`.                                                                                 
                                b. Modify `POIXMLProperties.java` to add static limit constants and getters.                                                                                                     
                                c. Update imports and method bodies in `XSSFSheet.java` and `ReadOnlySharedStringsTable.java` as detailed above.                                                                 
                                d. Build and run existing unit tests and fuzz harnesses to verify no regressions.                                                                                                
                                e. Perform an integration test with a large XLSX to confirm that timeouts are eliminated and appropriate exceptions are thrown on oversize input.                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                                                     
                             ===Evaluation End===

                             ===Issue===                                                                                                                                                                         
                             ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ===Evaluation Report===                                                                                                                                                             
                             # Evaluation Report                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Summary                                                                                                                                                                          
                             The project was experiencing fuzzer timeouts (ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout) when parsing large OOXML parts. To mitigate unbounded parsing costs, a patch was                           
                             introduced that:                                                                                                                                                                    
                             - Defines default size and row-count limits in POIXMLProperties.                                                                                                                    
                             - Wraps sheet and shared-strings XML InputStreams in a `LimitInputStream` using those limits.                                                                                       
                             - Enforces a maximum number of rows per sheet at parse time.                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             When the patch was applied, the build failed in the `poi-ooxml` module with multiple cannot find symbol: class LimitInputStream errors in `XSSFSheet.java` and                    
                             `ReadOnlySharedStringsTable.java`. The missing class prevented compilation, leading to an overall build failure.                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Description                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Initial Issue                                                                                                                                                                       
                             - Fuzzer runs on the OOXML parsing code repeatedly hit a timeout.                                                                                                                   
                             - No exceptions or errors inside the codebase itself were reported, only the libFuzzer timeout.                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Patch Attempt                                                                                                                                                                       
                             1. In `POIXMLProperties.java` (poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/ooxml/POIXMLProperties.java):                                                                                 
                                - Added constants for maximum sheet-XML bytes (50 MB), maximum rows per sheet (1 000 000), and maximum shared-strings bytes (10 MB).                                             
                                - Exposed these limits via static getter methods (`getMaxSheetXmlBytes()`, `getMaxRowsPerSheet()`, `getMaxSharedStringsBytes()`).                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             2. In `XSSFSheet.java` (poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/xssf/usermodel/XSSFSheet.java):                                                                                      
                                - Imported `org.apache.poi.openxml4j.util.LimitInputStream` and `POIXMLProperties`.                                                                                              
                                - Wrapped the incoming sheet XML InputStream in a `LimitInputStream` using the sheet-byte limit.                                                                                 
                                - Replaced the direct call to `WorksheetDocument.Factory.parse(is, )` with `parse(limited, )`.                                                                                 
                                - Added a simple counter in the row-iteration loop to throw if the number of rows exceeds the configured maximum.                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             3. In `ReadOnlySharedStringsTable.java` (poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/xssf/eventusermodel/ReadOnlySharedStringsTable.java):                                               
                                - Imported `LimitInputStream` and `POIXMLProperties`.                                                                                                                            
                                - Wrapped the shared-strings XML InputStream in a `LimitInputStream` with the shared-strings-byte limit.                                                                         
                                - Passed the limited stream into the parsing logic.                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Build Log After Patch                                                                                                                                                               
                             - The overall build succeeded in modules outside `poi-ooxml`, producing only deprecation and unchecked-cast warnings.                                                               
                             - In `poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/xssf/usermodel/XSSFSheet.java` and the corresponding eventusermodel class, the compiler reported six errors:                           
                               cannot find symbol: class LimitInputStream on all imports and usages.                                                                                                           
                             - As a result, `:poi-ooxml:compileJava` failed and the full build aborted.                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             Areas for Further Investigation                                                                                                                                                     
                             - Verify the existence and correct package of `LimitInputStream` in the `openxml4j` utility library.                                                                                
                             - Check module dependencies (Gradle/Maven) to ensure `openxml4j` version includes `LimitInputStream`, or adjust imports if the class moved.                                         
                             - Review `org.apache.poi.openxml4j.util` for alternative classes or methods that enforce stream limits.                                                                             
                             - Examine build configuration for missing library references or shading rules that might omit `LimitInputStream`.                                                                   
                             - Ensure that any new classes (e.g., stream-limiting utilities) are added to the repository or declared as dependencies prior to referencing them in `poi-ooxml`.                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             ## Initial Issue Log                                                                                                                                                                
                             Here is the initial issue log of the codebase:                                                                                                                                      
                             <issue>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </issue>

                             59:    static {

                             63:        NEW_CUST_INSTANCE = org.openxmlformats.schemas.officeDocument.x2006.customProperties.PropertiesDocument.Factory.newInstance();

                             65:    }                                                                                                                                                                            
                             66:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             67:    public POIXMLProperties(OPCPackage docPackage) throws IOException, OpenXML4JException, XmlException {

                             70:        // Core properties                                                                                                                                                       
                             71:        core = new CoreProperties((PackagePropertiesPart)pkg.getPackageProperties());                                                                                            
                             72:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             73:        // Extended properties                                                                                                                                                   
                             74:        PackageRelationshipCollection extRel =                                                                                                                                   
                             75:                pkg.getRelationshipsByType(PackageRelationshipTypes.EXTENDED_PROPERTIES);                                                                                        
                             76:        if(extRel.size() == 1) {                                                                                                                                                 
                             77:            extPart = pkg.getPart(extRel.getRelationship(0));                                                                                                                    
                             78:            if (extPart == null) {                                                                                                                                               
                             79:                ext = new ExtendedProperties((org.openxmlformats.schemas.officeDocument.x2006.extendedProperties.PropertiesDocument)NEW_EXT_INSTANCE.copy());                    
                             80:            } else {                                                                                                                                                             
                             81:                try (InputStream stream = extPart.getInputStream()) {

                             83:                            stream, DEFAULT_XML_OPTIONS);                                                                                                                        
                             84:                    ext = new ExtendedProperties(props);                                                                                                                         
                             85:                }                                                                                                                                                                
                             86:            }                                                                                                                                                                    
                             87:        } else {                                                                                                                                                                 
                             88:            extPart = null;                                                                                                                                                      
                             89:            ext = new ExtendedProperties((org.openxmlformats.schemas.officeDocument.x2006.extendedProperties.PropertiesDocument)NEW_EXT_INSTANCE.copy());                        
                             90:        }                                                                                                                                                                        
                             91:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             92:        // Custom properties                                                                                                                                                     
                             93:        PackageRelationshipCollection custRel =                                                                                                                                  
                             94:                pkg.getRelationshipsByType(PackageRelationshipTypes.CUSTOM_PROPERTIES);                                                                                          
                             95:        if(custRel.size() == 1) {                                                                                                                                                
                             96:            custPart = pkg.getPart(custRel.getRelationship(0));

                             <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
                             poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/openxml4j/util/ZipArchiveThresholdInputStream.java:34-100                                                                                    
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             34:import static org.apache.poi.openxml4j.util.ZipSecureFile.*;                                                                                                                     
                             35:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             36:@Internal                                                                                                                                                                        
                             37:public class ZipArchiveThresholdInputStream extends FilterInputStream {                                                                                                          
                             38:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             39:    private static final String MAX_ENTRY_SIZE_MSG =                                                                                                                             
                             40:        "Zip bomb detected! The file would exceed the max size of the expanded data in the zip-file.\n" +                                                                        
                             41:        "This may indicates that the file is used to inflate memory usage and thus could pose a security risk.\n" +                                                              
                             42:        "You can adjust this limit via ZipSecureFile.setMaxEntrySize() if you need to work with files which are very large.\n" +                                                 
                             43:        "Uncompressed size: %d, Raw/compressed size: %d\n" +                                                                                                                     
                             44:        "Limits: MAX_ENTRY_SIZE: %d, Entry: %s";                                                                                                                                 
                             45:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             46:    private static final String MIN_INFLATE_RATIO_MSG =                                                                                                                          
                             47:        "Zip bomb detected! The file would exceed the max. ratio of compressed file size to the size of the expanded data.\n" +                                                  
                             48:        "This may indicate that the file is used to inflate memory usage and thus could pose a security risk.\n" +                                                               
                             49:        "You can adjust this limit via ZipSecureFile.setMinInflateRatio() if you need to work with files which exceed this limit.\n" +                                           
                             50:        "Uncompressed size: %d, Raw/compressed size: %d, ratio: %f\n" +                                                                                                          
                             51:        "Limits: MIN_INFLATE_RATIO: %f, Entry: %s";                                                                                                                              
                             52:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             53:    /**                                                                                                                                                                          
                             54:     * the reference to the current entry is only used for a more detailed log message in case of an error                                                                       
                             55:     */                                                                                                                                                                          
                             56:    private ZipArchiveEntry entry;                                                                                                                                               
                             57:    private boolean guardState = true;                                                                                                                                           
                             58:    private long entryCount;                                                                                                                                                     
                             59:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             60:    public ZipArchiveThresholdInputStream(InputStream is) {                                                                                                                      
                             61:        super(is);                                                                                                                                                               
                             62:        if (!(is instanceof InputStreamStatistics)) {                                                                                                                            
                             63:            throw new IllegalArgumentException("InputStream of class "+is.getClass()+" is not implementing InputStreamStatistics.");                                             
                             64:        }                                                                                                                                                                        
                             65:    }                                                                                                                                                                            
                             66:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             67:    @Override                                                                                                                                                                    
                             68:    public int read() throws IOException {                                                                                                                                       
                             69:        int b = super.read();                                                                                                                                                    
                             70:        if (b > -1) {                                                                                                                                                            
                             71:            checkThreshold();                                                                                                                                                    
                             72:        }                                                                                                                                                                        
                             73:        return b;                                                                                                                                                                
                             74:    }                                                                                                                                                                            
                             75:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             76:    @Override                                                                                                                                                                    
                             77:    public int read(byte[] b, int off, int len) throws IOException {                                                                                                             
                             78:        int cnt = super.read(b, off, len);                                                                                                                                       
                             79:        if (cnt > -1) {                                                                                                                                                          
                             80:            checkThreshold();                                                                                                                                                    
                             81:        }                                                                                                                                                                        
                             82:        return cnt;                                                                                                                                                              
                             83:    }                                                                                                                                                                            
                             84:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             85:    @Override                                                                                                                                                                    
                             86:    public long skip(long n) throws IOException {                                                                                                                                
                             87:        long cnt = IOUtils.skipFully(super.in, n);                                                                                                                               
                             88:        if (cnt > 0) {                                                                                                                                                           
                             89:            checkThreshold();                                                                                                                                                    
                             90:        }                                                                                                                                                                        
                             91:       return cnt;                                                                                                                                                               
                             92:    }                                                                                                                                                                            
                             93:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             94:    /**                                                                                                                                                                          
                             95:     * De-/activate threshold check.                                                                                                                                             
                             96:     * A disabled guard might make sense, when POI is processing its own temporary data (see #59743)                                                                             
                             97:     *                                                                                                                                                                           
                             98:     * @param guardState {@code true} (= default) enables the threshold check                                                                                                    
                             99:     */                                                                                                                                                                          
                             100:    public void setGuardState(boolean guardState) {                                                                                                                             
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
                             poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/openxml4j/util/ZipArchiveThresholdInputStream.java:36-44                                                                                     
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             36:@Internal                                                                                                                                                                        
                             37:public class ZipArchiveThresholdInputStream extends FilterInputStream {                                                                                                          
                             38:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             39:    private static final String MAX_ENTRY_SIZE_MSG =                                                                                                                             
                             40:        "Zip bomb detected! The file would exceed the max size of the expanded data in the zip-file.\n" +                                                                        
                             41:        "This may indicates that the file is used to inflate memory usage and thus could pose a security risk.\n" +                                                              
                             42:        "You can adjust this limit via ZipSecureFile.setMaxEntrySize() if you need to work with files which are very large.\n" +                                                 
                             43:        "Uncompressed size: %d, Raw/compressed size: %d\n" +                                                                                                                     
                             44:        "Limits: MAX_ENTRY_SIZE: %d, Entry: %s";                                                                                                                                 
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             </code>                                                                                                                                                                             
                             <code>                                                                                                                                                                              
                             poi-ooxml/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/xssf/usermodel/XSSFSheet.java:29-35                                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             29:import javax.xml.namespace.QName;                                                                                                                                                
                             30:import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;                                                                                                                                      
                             31:import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader;                                                                                                                                         
                             32:                                                                                                                                                                                 
                             33:import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
